name: @inline-i18n-multi/swc-plugin
description: SWC plugin for inline-i18n-multi build-time optimization

scripts.build: [ -f target/wasm32-wasip1/release/inline_i18n_multi_swc.wasm ] && echo 'WASM already built, skipping' || (command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1 && cargo build --release --target wasm32-wasip1 || echo 'Cargo not found, skipping build')
